item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 29, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:

24. Guide to mechanical keyboards (106 points | 121 comments)
25. Carlsen disqualified from World Rapid and Blitz championship for wearing jeans (276 points | 334 comments)
26. My history with Forth and stack machines (2010) (96 points | 24 comments)
27. Numbers Are Leaves (206 points | 60 comments)
28. So you want to write Java in Neovim (142 points | 127 comments)
29. EU law mandating universal chargers for devices comes into force (192 points | 191 comments)
